attributes.action: Stop the United Kingdom from funding and participating in the Eurovision Song Contest ever again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2008 Eurovision Song Contest was a huge embarrassment to every British Citizen. Let us stop wasting our money  by participating in this fixed contest. This contest is an affront to fair play and honesty and year after year we place ourselves in the same position.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
